name: Hurt (Haste421)
description: Welcome to the world of Hurt. Earth has gone dark due to EMP’s destroying all technology. When an alien army by the name of the “Purge” invades the planet, an old hermit named Vic Viper finds his opportunity to escape from earth and find the peace he so desires. Teaming up with Doctor Veronica Sterling the two hatch a plan to steal an alien ship and flee the invasion.
